product_name: cocokindCeramide Lip Blur Balm Hydrating & Smoothing Lip Treatment
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive Backcocokind's Ceramide Lip Blur Balm Hydrating & Smoothing Lip Treatment is infused with skin-loving ceramides and peptides. Nourishing lip balm locks in hydration and blurs for a fuller, plump look. Glides on smooth and soft. Designed for sensitive lips without flavor, fragrance, or common irritants.
details: DetailsBenefitsSpecifically designed to support the lip's thinner skin barrierCushiony formula comforts and conditionsBlurs the look of fine lines and give lips a plump, full lookAvailable in clear or 4 sheer tints, each shade has a glossy finishDesigned for sensitive lips: unflavored, no fragrance, no petrolatum, no lanolin, no essential oilsItem 2636757How To UseSwipe onto lips as needed to hydrate and blur.IngredientsPolybutene, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Glycerin, Ceramide Np, Ceramide Ap, Portulaca Pilosa Extract*, Tocopherol, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-38, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Isostearyl Isostearate, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, Sorbitan Isostearate, Sucrose Cocoate, Titanium Dioxide, Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090).* Kiss Me Quick Flower.
how_to_use: Swipe onto lips as needed to hydrate and blur.

reviews.headline: I can not recommend Be Real and Be Powerful ENOUGH!
reviews.comments: This balm is a thinner consistency compared to the Ole Henriksen which is my holy grail, so it's a flexible as both an overnight treatment and over a lip combo in the daytime. This is the only other lip balm I use aside from my Ole Henriksen; everything else has been been left in the dust. I specifically go for this when I don't need to commit to a heavy duty lip treatment but still want my lips nourished and feeling slick and smooth instead of sticky. I got it four shades, but I gravitate towards natural shades like Be Real and Be Powerful since the pigment would separate in Be Bold and Be You and occasionally settle into my lip creases. I was really surprised at how much I ended up loving Be Powerful. It was so unassuming but is now easily my favorite shade. If you're debating shades like I did (I ended up buying all of them), I would 100% repurchase Be Real and Be Powerful, and it is so refreshing that cocokind has made it a priority to sell high quality products at a reasonable price. I'm proud to support Cocokind, and the hype is well-deserved!

reviews.headline: Love this, but WHAT happened?
reviews.comments:
I bought my lip balm when it launched in April, and i have been in love with it since. I love how long the product lasts and the gloss it gives. The moisurizing effects are phenominal.

BUT, all of a sudden it smelled like fungus or bacteria! I went for a second swipe after a few hours and it was REVOLTING. Trying to understand what happened, i think it has something to do with the product design and air getting into the tube? (I'm probably wrong). 

I am so dissappinted, the product is marked to last for 12 months, and I've only had it for 5 :(

reviews.headline: awesome product
reviews.comments: Nice color that lasts well. Super moisturizing with a thick, cushiony texture. Cool applicator simialr to simmer fridays, and unique keychain-style lid thats I loveee

reviews.headline: Terrible Consistency
reviews.comments:
I bought this soley for the keychain lid because I'm a teacher and like the idea of something I can keep on my lanyard. 
Unfortunately, I cant stand the formula. It's thick, SO sticky, and basically just feels like a cheap lip gloss‚Äîdespite being advertised as a lip balm.
I can't recommend this product to anyone unless you like goop that sticks your lips together.

reviews.headline: too sticky and separates
reviews.comments: did not like this 'lip balm' at all. lip balm? it feels more like a gloss, too sticky, not really moisturizing and the product separates in the tube.

reviews.headline: Happy Surprise
reviews.comments: I saw this lip gloss on sale for BOGO so I figured why not. I was pleasantly surprised at the results of it. The colors are pretty and my lips are hydrated for a long time after use. I plan to explore other prodcuts in the brand now.

reviews.headline: Found the perfect everyday color
reviews.comments: I use this lip balm everyday and it has the perfect color with or without makeup

reviews.headline: feels so good
reviews.comments: so comfortable and i am absolutely obsessed with the fact that you can clip it onto your keychain! im going to try other shades.

reviews.headline: favorite lip balm
reviews.comments: I LOVE this product. Beautiful color, and is one of the most hydrating balm/glosses I've found. Like my lips feel softened and hydrated even after its worn off over the course of the day. I would recommend to anyone!

reviews.headline: Pigment is ofd
reviews.comments: I love dark browns but unfortunately this is barely browns. It mostly comes out as clear.

reviews.headline: My fav affordable lip product!
reviews.comments: I am absolutely obsessed with this balm! I use this every single night before bed and I still feel it on my lips most mornings. It has a thick texture with some grip without feeling sticky or uncomfortable. It also leaves a stunning glossy shine on the lips which I love. I have only tried "Be Real" but I've got to get my hands on "Be Kind" next! Genuinely can't be beat at this amazing price point.

reviews.headline: A nice stain
reviews.comments: This color has a nice stain to it. The formula is moisturizing. It makes for a good Rhode Peptide Lip Tint dupe. I also like that you could clip it onto a keychain for even more on the go use.

reviews.headline: Started out great.
reviews.comments: I really love the formula of this lipbalm, but after a few months it started smelling so unbeliavably bad that I had to stop using. It smells sour and just off. I probably won't buy another one because I'm afraid of the same thing happening. If you use up lipbalm super fast (less than 2-3 months) maybe it'd be perfect.

reviews.headline: My favorite!
reviews.comments: Obsessed with this lippie. It goes on so smoothly and isn't sticky. No scent to it which IÔ∏è love and all the colors look amazing. Just bought my second cuz IÔ∏è want them all

reviews.headline: My new fav lip gloss!
reviews.comments: I have tried almost every lip gloss on the planet and I keep running back to this one! I feel like sometimes I like others just for the smell/flavor but this one truly keeps my lips hydrated and tinted all day long!

reviews.headline: Wanted to like this...
reviews.comments: I was very excited to try this product, but it's a bit too sticky for me. Then after several months of owning and using the product, it started to smell -- like that same smell you get when an ant is crushed. I was so sad :(

reviews.headline: Pillow soft lips
reviews.comments: This is one lip balm thag actually makes my lios feel soft, even after its worn off! I want every shade now!

reviews.headline: Great product, mine had built up pressure?
reviews.comments: This product is amazingly hydrating and glossy even for my acccutane lips. My only proble is that when it was delivered, my tube wouldn't stop spilling product out every time i opened it like pressure was built up inside. When it stopped doing that, my tube was almost half empty

reviews.headline: Amazing - Do Not Miss!!!
reviews.comments: This is THE most hydrating lippie I have ever used!! It had such a beautiful pop of color too! I only have "Be Kind" right now but I want them all! I can't wait to try the rest. I love cocokind FOREVER please do not stop making this!!!üíúüíú

reviews.headline: Absolute Perfection
reviews.comments: Love, Love, Love! If you love Non-Scented lip balms, this is for you!

faceoff_positive.comments:
I absolutely love this lip blur balm. It feels like a combination of a lip balm and a lip gloss, both of which I love to use!!. I'm so happy I got one of these before they sold out. The soft pink is lovely and the formula is so soothing and hydrating on my lips. The only reason I knocked off a star is because when I received it in the mail, the formula was separated a little bit (I know this could have probably been going through hot and cold climates in shipping) and it took a while to get the formula to mix again. 

I know Priscilla talked about how much product is in the tube on instagram and TikTok, but I have to agree with the people that say it feels like there isn't a lot of product in the tube. When I push the product up to the top of the tube to get some out, it feels like the tube is empty and like there is hardly anything in there. 
I appreciate the transparency of Cocokind SOO much and I'm willing to overlook this as they said they are willing to adjust for the future lippies. 
With that said, I would absolutely LOVE if Cocokind came out with a shimmery lip blur balm and maybe even some scented/flavored ones for those of us who don't have sensitive skin on their lips. I have been following Cocokind for quite some time now and I have loved seeing their growth over the years. Their skincare is the only one I use and the only one I've gotten to work for me. PLEASE CONTINUE TO MAKE NEW PRODUCTS!!!!! : ) < 3
faceoff_positive.headline: LOVELY!!!

faceoff_negative.comments: I do not self identify as someone with sensitive skin and have never had an allergic reaction to any product but this was a first. It took me a minute to realize it was from this product. I noticed cheilitis being induced after using this but wearing a retainer usually causes this anyway. Then i rubbed off some excess balm on my hand and then noticed my hand started itching in that exact spot to the point that it created open sores. My mouth now looks like i have herpes and my hand is still red and sensitive where i wiped off the excess. Does this product need to be recalled and that's why they keep having sales on it? It's also not a true balm. Its a gloss. I got one for my husband who always misplaces his balms and he said he felt like lil mama bc his lip gloss was poppin. It does not calm down my chapped lips but irritates my skin around my lips. Very strange since it claims to be formulated for sensitive skin and i dont even have sensitive skin. Maybe itll work for others but i may have to return every color i got. Hope they come out with a better balmy non rash inducing formula in the future bc the keychain aspect is dope. Or hopefully others start jumping on the keychain cap bandwagon to make this the new norm. I thought I could swap out my husband's current balm so he could keep it on his key ring but the cap must be specially made to only fit cocokind balms.
faceoff_negative.headline: Wanted to love but

rollup.name: Ceramide Lip Blur Balm Hydrating & Smoothing Lip Treatment
